body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting us. My name is Arthur Torres and I represent ABC Autos, how may I assist you today? May I kindly ask for your name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Good day, my name is Ashley Sanders.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Ashley. To better assist you, may I ask for the vehicle make and model you are interested in as well as your phone number, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm looking for a black Sedan from XYZ brand and my phone number is one two three four five six seven eight nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great choice, Ashley. Just to confirm, you are interested in a black Sedan from XYZ brand, and your phone number is one two three four five six seven eight nine. Is that correct?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Ashley. We will check our inventory and get back to you shortly. Is there anything else you would like to inquire about today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. I appreciate your assistance.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Ashley. Thank you for reaching out to us. We will be in touch as soon as possible. Have a wonderful day.
